channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My Beer Run Of The Future: QR Codes And Real-Time Payments
item.description: Through QR code payments, unique innovations can be brought to merchants, billers and consumers.

item.title: Tracking Down The Mysterious Phoenix Ghost Kamikaze Drone
item.description: Open source documents reveal details and images of the most elusive drone supplied to Ukraine and the surprisingly large numbers being shipped.
